articles.title: Waiter, there's a cockroach in my hotpot: Man in China nabbed for scamming Haidilao - AsiaOne
articles.description: A man recently got in the soup after scamming not one, but two hotpot restaurants in a day. On May 17, he dined alone at two Haidilao outlets in Shenzhen, China, and complained about the cockroach he discovered in his hotpot. When the restaurant staff offered…
articles.content:

articles.title: FIBA Asia Cup Qualifiers: Belangel, Sotto to lead Gilas vs Indonesia - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: SJ Belangel, Kai Sotto, and Ange Kouame are set to make their second appearance for Gilas Pilipinas as they take on Indonesia in the FIBA Asia Cup Qualifiers on Friday at AUF Gym in Pampanga.
articles.content:
Javi Gomez de Liaño to also suit up for Philippines
